data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Tamenglong, Manipur, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tamenglong, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,703 believers in the county of Tamenglong to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Tamenglong, Manipur, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Tamenglong, Manipur, India. Please, stir the 2,703 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, please remember the Meitei Thanga people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Tamenglong, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Tamenglong, Manipur, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Tamenglong. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Tamenglong
location.people_groups_list: Barman, Meitei Kshatriya, Hrangkhol, Murasing, Kanda
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Barman (6,700), Meitei Kshatriya (119,000), Hrangkhol (6,900), Murasing (14,000), Kanda (2,600)
